item.title: Etihad launches exclusive city-inspired Business Class amenities
item.description:
Source: Etihad Airways. Etihad Airways has introduced new limited-edition amenity kits for their Business Class travelers. This launch is a collaboration between the airline and the luxury travel brand LUXE City Guides, a company known for its sophisticated travel guides. The kits reflect Etihad Airways’ elegant brand and include in-flight amenities and natural facial products. These products were specially created by Scaramouche + Fandango, a London-based skincare and grooming company...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/etihad-launches-exclusive-city-inspired-business-class-amenities/
